item.title: Unpossess: Exorcism Simulator
item.description:
Title: Unpossess: Exorcism Simulator
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Chreseeba Games
Publisher: Chreseeba Games
Release Date: Jan 10, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 10, 2025




About This Game

Unpossess is a 1-4 cooperative exorcism simulator game set in the early 1900s. Drawing inspiration from iconic supernatural films, players step into the shoes of exorcists tasked with numerous cases of demonic possession.

Whether alone or with your demonologist companions, you will have to exorcise evil spirits.

You'll encounter cases involving human possession that demand your attention. Your primary objectives include cleansing the afflicted area, capturing evidence, and conducting an exorcism ritual to free the possessed individual from demonic influence. However, as you pursue these objectives, you'll need to carefully manage your own health and sanity.

Progression

Unpossess offers a progression system where you can unlock new abilities and cosmetics as you gain more experience.

Character customization

Customize your exorcist with your own style.

Haunted object collection

Players will have their own haunted object collection, which they can showcase in the pre-case lobby.

Demonic AI

Encounter dynamically generated demonic AI, ensuring each possession case is a unique challenge.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
    • DirectX: Version 12
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
    • DirectX: Version 12

item.title: NBA 2K25 MyTEAM Bonus Offer: Season 4
item.description:
Title: NBA 2K25 MyTEAM Bonus Offer: Season 4
Genre: Simulation , Sports
Developer: Visual Concepts
Publisher: 2K
Franchise: NBA 2K
Release Date: Jan 10, 2025




About This Content

Season 4 MyTEAM Bonus Offer & MyCAREER Bonus Offer will expire at 7:59AM PT, February 21st, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 4 MyTEAM Bonus Offer or MyCAREER Bonus Offer is non-refundable. Terms Apply.

NBA 2K25 Season 4 MyTEAM Bonus Offer includes the following items:

• 120 Minute 2XP Coin (MT)

• 95+ OVR Pink Diamond Player Pack (UA)

• 10,000 MTP

• 75,000 VC

*NBA 2K Account required. One redemption per NBA 2K Account. Offer Ends: February 21st, 2025 7:59AM PT. Terms Apply.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-9100 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 4 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 4 GB or Intel® Arc™ A580
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 150 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required. Dual-analog Gamepad recommended. Initial installation requires one-time internet connection for Steam authentication; software installations required (included with the game) include DirectX and Visual C++ Redistributable 2019. In order to play NBA 2K25 on PC, you need a processor capable of supporting AVX2 and a graphics card capable of supporting DirectX feature level 12.0.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 8 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 8 GB or Intel® Arc™ A770
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 150 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required. Dual-analog Gamepad recommended. Initial installation requires one-time internet connection for Steam authentication; software installations required (included with the game) include DirectX and Visual C++ Redistributable 2019. In order to play NBA 2K25 on PC, you need a processor capable of supporting AVX2 and a graphics card capable of supporting DirectX feature level 12.0.

item.title: NBA 2K25 Hall of Fame Pass: Season 4
item.description:
Title: NBA 2K25 Hall of Fame Pass: Season 4
Genre: Simulation , Sports
Developer: Visual Concepts
Publisher: 2K
Franchise: NBA 2K
Release Date: Jan 10, 2025




About This Content

Season 4 Pro Pass & Hall of Fame Pass will expire at 7:59AM PT, February 21st, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 4 Pro Pass or Hall of Fame Pass is non-refundable.

The NBA 2K25 Hall of Fame Pass: Season 4 takes your MyCAREER and MyTEAM experience to the next level. The Season 4 Hall of Fame Pass includes everything in the Pro Pass (access to 40 levels of earnable premium rewards, and 4 additional Season Pass Rewards) a 15% XP Booster for the entire season, and 10 Level Skips immediately applied to the Season reward track, & 15,000 VC!

*NBA 2K25 Pro Passes and Hall of Fame passes are available for separate purchase and require base game, internet connection and NBA 2K account. Paid premium passes unlock additional rewards for the season that are earnable through gameplay. Progress and rewards reset at the end of each season.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 4 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 4 GB or Intel® Arc™ A580
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 150 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required. Dual-analog Gamepad recommended. Initial installation requires one-time internet connection for Steam authentication; software installations required (included with the game) include DirectX and Visual C++ Redistributable 2019. In order to play NBA 2K25 on PC, you need a processor capable of supporting AVX2 and a graphics card capable of supporting DirectX feature level 12.0.

item.title: Cursed Digicam | 呪われたデジカメ
item.description:
Title: Cursed Digicam | 呪われたデジカメ
Genre: Indie
Developer: Chilla's Art
Publisher: Chilla's Art
Franchise: Chilla's Art, LLC
Release Date: Jan 9, 2025




About This Game

You receive a cursed digital camera that captures ghosts from a strange website.

The website allows you to liberate your loved ones by uploading images of their spirits using the camera.

You go to the nearest park where your girl was last seen.

  • No multiple endings

  • Game Length: 60 to 90 minutes, depending on your play style.

  • Supporter content can be turned on and off in the main menu. (It is on by default).

Use the special camera made by a medium and find the ghost of your daughter, but an unexpected visitor might show up.

Hint system: Call the numbers left by your daughter. She will help you find her through hints.

Authentic Japanese park

If you encounter any problems, please try the following:

-Make sure your hardware supports DX12

-Update GPU driver

-Lower the Graphics settings/Screen resolution and use upscaling (TSR, DLSS, FSR, etc)

-Latest Windows update

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Blood
Suicide



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 x64
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10600 or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GTX 1060 (6GB VRAM) or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Yes
    • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended. A minimum of 6GB VRAM and DirectX 12 supported Hardware required.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 x64
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-10700K or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX 3060 or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Yes
    • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended. A minimum of 6GB VRAM and DirectX 12 supported Hardware required.
